title: Update Rust crate crossbeam-utils to 0.8.14
body:
[![Mend Renovate](https://app.renovatebot.com/images/banner.svg)](https://renovatebot.com)

This PR contains the following updates:

| Package | Type | Update | Change |
|---|---|---|---|
| [crossbeam-utils](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/tree/master/crossbeam-utils) ([source](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam)) | dependencies | patch | `0.8.7` -> `0.8.14` |

---

### Release Notes

<details>
<summary>crossbeam-rs/crossbeam</summary>

### [`v0.8.14`](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/releases/tag/crossbeam-utils-0.8.14): crossbeam-utils 0.8.14

[Compare Source](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/compare/crossbeam-utils-0.8.13...crossbeam-utils-0.8.14)

-   Fix build script bug introduced in 0.8.13. ([#​932](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/issues/932))

### [`v0.8.13`](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/releases/tag/crossbeam-utils-0.8.13): crossbeam-utils 0.8.13

[Compare Source](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/compare/crossbeam-utils-0.8.12...crossbeam-utils-0.8.13)

-   Improve support for custom targets. ([#​922](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/issues/922))

### [`v0.8.12`](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/releases/tag/crossbeam-utils-0.8.12): crossbeam-utils 0.8.12

[Compare Source](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/compare/crossbeam-utils-0.8.11...crossbeam-utils-0.8.12)

-   Remove the dependency on the `once_cell` crate to restore the MSRV. ([#​913](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/issues/913))
-   Work around [rust-lang#​98302](https://togithub.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/98302), which causes compile error on windows-gnu when LTO is enabled. ([#​913](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/issues/913))

### [`v0.8.11`](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/releases/tag/crossbeam-utils-0.8.11): crossbeam-utils 0.8.11

[Compare Source](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/compare/crossbeam-utils-0.8.10...crossbeam-utils-0.8.11)

-   Bump the minimum supported Rust version to 1.38. ([#​877](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/issues/877))

### [`v0.8.10`](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/releases/tag/crossbeam-utils-0.8.10): crossbeam-utils 0.8.10

[Compare Source](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/compare/crossbeam-utils-0.8.9...crossbeam-utils-0.8.10)

-   Fix unsoundness of `AtomicCell` on types containing niches. ([#​834](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/issues/834))
    This fix contains breaking changes, but they are allowed because this is a soundness bug fix. See [#​834](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/issues/834) for more.

### [`v0.8.9`](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/releases/tag/crossbeam-utils-0.8.9): crossbeam-utils 0.8.9

[Compare Source](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/compare/crossbeam-utils-0.8.8...crossbeam-utils-0.8.9)

-   Replace lazy_static with once_cell. ([#​817](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/issues/817))

### [`v0.8.8`](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/releases/tag/crossbeam-utils-0.8.8): crossbeam-utils 0.8.8

[Compare Source](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/compare/crossbeam-utils-0.8.7...crossbeam-utils-0.8.8)

-   Fix a bug when unstable `loom` support is enabled. ([#​787](https://togithub.com/crossbeam-rs/crossbeam/issues/787))

</details>

---

### Configuration

title: Update Rust crate tokio to 1.24.1
body:
[![Mend Renovate](https://app.renovatebot.com/images/banner.svg)](https://renovatebot.com)

This PR contains the following updates:

| Package | Type | Update | Change |
|---|---|---|---|
| [tokio](https://tokio.rs) ([source](https://togithub.com/tokio-rs/tokio)) | dependencies | minor | `1.23.0` -> `1.24.1` |

---

### Release Notes

<details>
<summary>tokio-rs/tokio</summary>

### [`v1.24.1`](https://togithub.com/tokio-rs/tokio/releases/tag/tokio-1.24.1): Tokio v1.24.1

[Compare Source](https://togithub.com/tokio-rs/tokio/compare/tokio-1.24.0...tokio-1.24.1)

This release fixes a compilation failure on targets without `AtomicU64` when using rustc older than 1.63. ([#​5356])

[#​5356]: https://togithub.com/tokio-rs/tokio/pull/5356

### [`v1.24.0`](https://togithub.com/tokio-rs/tokio/releases/tag/tokio-1.24.0): Tokio v1.24.0

[Compare Source](https://togithub.com/tokio-rs/tokio/compare/tokio-1.23.1...tokio-1.24.0)

The highlight of this release is the reduction of lock contention for all I/O operations ([#​5300](https://togithub.com/tokio-rs/tokio/issues/5300)). We have received reports of up to a 20% improvement in CPU utilization and increased throughput for real-world I/O heavy applications.

##### Fixed

-   rt: improve native `AtomicU64` support detection ([#​5284])

##### Added

-   rt: add configuration option for max number of I/O events polled from the OS
    per tick ([#​5186])
-   rt: add an environment variable for configuring the default number of worker
    threads per runtime instance ([#​4250])

##### Changed

-   sync: reduce MPSC channel stack usage ([#​5294])
-   io: reduce lock contention in I/O operations  ([#​5300])
-   fs: speed up `read_dir()` by chunking operations ([#​5309])
-   rt: use internal `ThreadId` implementation ([#​5329])
-   test: don't auto-advance time when a `spawn_blocking` task is running ([#​5115])

[#​5186]: https://togithub.com/tokio-rs/tokio/pull/5186

[#​5294]: https://togithub.com/tokio-rs/tokio/pull/5294

[#​5284]: https://togithub.com/tokio-rs/tokio/pull/5284

[#​4250]: https://togithub.com/tokio-rs/tokio/pull/4250

[#​5300]: https://togithub.com/tokio-rs/tokio/pull/5300

[#​5329]: https://togithub.com/tokio-rs/tokio/pull/5329

[#​5115]: https://togithub.com/tokio-rs/tokio/pull/5115

[#​5309]: https://togithub.com/tokio-rs/tokio/pull/5309

### [`v1.23.1`](https://togithub.com/tokio-rs/tokio/releases/tag/tokio-1.23.1): Tokio v1.23.1

[Compare Source](https://togithub.com/tokio-rs/tokio/compare/tokio-1.23.0...tokio-1.23.1)

This release forward ports changes from 1.18.4.

##### Fixed

-   net: fix Windows named pipe server builder to maintain option when toggling
    pipe mode ([#​5336]).

[#​5336]: https://togithub.com/tokio-rs/tokio/pull/5336

</details>

---

### Configuration

📅 **Schedule**: Branch creation - At any time (no schedule defined), Automerge - At any time (no schedule defined).

♻ **Rebasing**: Whenever PR becomes conflicted, or you tick the rebase/retry checkbox.
